description.narrative: Improved national capacity to coordinate, track and provide HIV services for adolescents in all districts, particularly adolescent girls by 2018.

sector.narrative: HIV Prevention programs for adolescents including Key population such as condom programming, VMMC and PreP
HIV and AIDS monitoring and bottleneck analysis
Harm reduction among adolescent drug users
Support Policy and guidance developments and address barriers to accessing HIV services by adolescents including gender mainstreaming

title.narrative: Lesotho United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Lesotho Country Programme Document 2013-2017 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Lesotho 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Lesotho Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved national capacity to coordinate, track and provide HIV services for adolescents in all districts, particularly adolescent girls by 2018.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the National AIDS Commission (NAC) in the development of the new National HIV Strategic Plan (NSP) and subsequent documents, including national HIV targets, and the M&E framework. UNICEF further supported UNAIDS and NAC in the development of the HIV Prevention Roadmap and setting national prevention targets. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:05/12/2018

title.narrative: Automated dashboards (including bottleneck analysis) scorecards, alerts and reports to support monitoring and enhance use of data to improve Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn, Adolescent and Child Health services
